en: I am going to visit my aunt.
example: I am going to visit my aunt this weekend.

en: She is going to study tonight.
example: She is going to study for her exam tonight.

en: We are going to buy tickets.
example: We are going to buy tickets for the concert.

en: He is going to play soccer tomorrow.
example: He is going to play soccer with friends tomorrow.

en: They are going to move to a new house.
example: They are going to move next month.

en: I am going to make dinner soon.
example: I am going to make dinner in an hour.

en: She is going to watch the concert.
example: She is going to the concert tonight.

en: We are going to practice English.
example: We are going to practice English after school.

en: He is going to fix the bike.
example: He is going to fix the bike this afternoon.

en: They are going to clean the park.
example: They are going to clean the park this Saturday.

en: I am going to learn a new song.
example: I am going to learn a new song for the show.

en: She is going to start a new book.
example: She is going to start a new book tonight.

en: We are going to visit the zoo.
example: We are going to visit the zoo next week.

en: He is going to learn to swim.
example: He is going to take swimming lessons.

en: They are going to adopt a puppy.
example: They are going to adopt a puppy this weekend.
